text: Ishiro Honda or Inoshiro Honda was a Japanese movie director famous for making Godzilla the 1954 movie with Eiji Tsuburaya, Tomoyuki Tanaka, Shinichi Sekizawa and Akira Ifukube. == Filmography == === Directed === * Godzilla (1954 movie) * Mothra (1961 movie) * Rodan (1956 movie) * Battle in Outer Space * Frankenstein vs. Baragon * Mothra vs, Godzilla === Assistant director === * Tadano bonji * Three Sisters with Maiden Hearts == References == Category:1911 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Japanese movie directors
title: Ishir≈ç Honda
